creditline: Gift of Yang and Helen H. Wang
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: figures in multicolored clouds against blue striated background; three-eyed man at top with long hair, holding a sword over his head, riding a blue, green, red and yellow fantastic animal; man below, under a green, red and blue canopy, riding a red dragon, accompanied by white crane and four attendants; pair of figures below flaking man under canopy, each riding fantastic animals--man at left with two attendants, man at right with one; large warrior figure with long hair and sword, standing on a turtle; pair of figures at bottom corners--man with three eyes in LRC and dark-skinned man in LLC
dimension:
63 5/16 x 19 1/4 in. (160.81 x 48.9 cm) (image)
63 1/2 x 22 13/16 in. (161.29 x 57.94 cm) (overall, without roller)
title: Daoist Pantheon II
